trans-unit.source: Represents an application that is available for use with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Representa um aplicativo que está disponível para uso com a infraestrutura de Colaboração entre Pares.

trans-unit.source: An application is a set of software or software features available to a peer from an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo é um conjunto de software ou recursos de software disponíveis para um par de um ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: Commonly, this refers to network-enabled software packages such as games or other collaborative applications.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, isso se refere a pacotes de software de rede habilitado como jogos ou outros aplicativos de colaboração.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> defines the set of software applications or components available for use with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> network.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> define o conjunto de aplicativos de software ou componentes disponíveis para uso com o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> rede.

trans-unit.source: This network enables infrastructure participants to initiate usage of this application.
trans-unit.target: Esta rede permite que os participantes de infraestrutura iniciar o uso deste aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: They may initiate a collaboration session using the application identified by this class.
trans-unit.target: Eles podem iniciar uma sessão de colaboração usando o aplicativo identificado por essa classe.

trans-unit.source: After constructing an instance of this class and setting the appropriate properties, this object may be used in <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer> collaboration sessions.
trans-unit.target: Depois de construir uma instância dessa classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas, esse objeto pode ser usado em <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer> sessões de colaboração.

trans-unit.source: Its use is accomplished by passing it to the peer collaboration <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.RegisterApplication%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.UnregisterApplication%2A> methods, which will enable or disable it.
trans-unit.target: Seu uso é realizado passando-o para a colaboração ponto a ponto <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.RegisterApplication%2A> e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.UnregisterApplication%2A> métodos, que habilita ou desabilita a ele.

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: O identificador global exclusivo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> propriedades desta instância devem ser definidas antes que o aplicativo pode ser registrado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: After registering an application with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure, the registration information persists in the registry.
trans-unit.target: Depois de registrar um aplicativo com a infraestrutura de colaboração ponto a ponto, as informações de registro persistem no registro.

trans-unit.source: This makes the application available to collaboration applications even after the program which registered the application has exited.
trans-unit.target: Isso torna o aplicativo disponível para aplicativos de colaboração mesmo depois que o programa registrado o aplicativo foi encerrado.

trans-unit.source: Changing the properties on an application instance after it has been registered has no effect on the registration.
trans-unit.target: Alterando as propriedades em uma instância de aplicativo depois que ele foi registrado não tem efeito sobre o registro.

trans-unit.source: To update the registration, the application must be unregistered and then registered again with the new information.
trans-unit.target: Para atualizar o registro, o aplicativo deve ser não registrado e, em seguida, registrado novamente com as novas informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: O identificador global exclusivo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> propriedades desta instância devem ser definidas antes que o aplicativo pode ser registrado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância padrão do tipo <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: O identificador global exclusivo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> propriedades desta instância devem ser definidas antes que o aplicativo pode ser registrado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The serialization destination associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: O destino de serialização associado ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> type with the data required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do tipo <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> com os dados necessários para serialização.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> object with a name fully qualified by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> object within it.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> objeto com um nome totalmente qualificado o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> objeto dentro dele.

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: O identificador global exclusivo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> propriedades desta instância devem ser definidas antes que o aplicativo pode ser registrado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: A user-specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> used to identify the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> especificado pelo usuário usado para identificar o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> description of the peer application.
trans-unit.target: Uma descrição <see cref="T:System.String" /> do aplicativo de pares.

trans-unit.source: A binary data object to associate with the peer application, such as a small image.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de dados binário a ser associado ao aplicativo de pares, como uma imagem pequena.

trans-unit.source: The local file system path to the peer application.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do sistema de arquivos local para o aplicativo de pares.

trans-unit.source: Command-line arguments for starting the peer application.
trans-unit.target: Argumentos de linha de comando para iniciar o aplicativo de pares.

trans-unit.source: The scope in which the application will be registered for peer collaboration.
trans-unit.target: O escopo no qual o aplicativo será registrado para colaboração entre pares.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance with the supplied application ID, description, scope, and data elements.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> com a ID do aplicativo, a descrição, o escopo e os elementos de dados.

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: O identificador global exclusivo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> propriedades desta instância devem ser definidas antes que o aplicativo pode ser registrado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: Length of the binary data object cannot be less than one or greater than 16k.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do objeto de dados binário não pode ser menor que um ou maior que 16K.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> é definido como <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised whenever a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> is added, updated or deleted by a remote peer on a subscribed endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado sempre que um <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> é adicionado, atualizado ou excluído por um par remoto em um ponto de extremidade inscrito.

trans-unit.source: Use of this event requires a value of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission> object that was created when the peer collaboration session began.
trans-unit.target: O uso desse evento requer um valor de <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> no <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> do <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission> objeto que foi criado quando a sessão de colaboração ponto a ponto começou.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets command-line parameters to use when initiating a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os parâmetros de linha de comando a serem usados ao iniciar um <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents application-specific command-line parameters to use when initiating the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa os parâmetros de linha de comando específicas do aplicativo para usar ao iniciar o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets data associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os dados associados à instância de <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> data that contain a binary object to associate with the peer application.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> dados que contêm um objeto binário para associar o aplicativo de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: This is commonly a small image or XML blob.
trans-unit.target: Esse geralmente é uma imagem pequena ou blob XML.

trans-unit.source: This data is free form and is provided by the hosting peer.
trans-unit.target: Esses dados são forma livre e são fornecidos pelo host correspondente.

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of data that can be provided is 4,096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade máxima de dados que podem ser fornecidos é de 4.096 bytes.

trans-unit.source: This data is not part of a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> invitation, but rather allows additional data to be associated with the application on the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Esses dados não são parte de um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> convite, mas em vez disso, permite que os dados adicionais a serem associados com o aplicativo no par local.

trans-unit.source: The size of this binary data object is either less than 0 or greater than 4,096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do objeto de dados binário é menor que 0 ou maior que 4.096 bytes.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Unicode <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <see cref="T:System.String" /> Unicode que descreve o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.String" /> value that describes the application.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> valor que descreve o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A menos que especificado, o valor padrão dessa propriedade é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This data is not part of a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> invitation.
trans-unit.target: Esses dados não são parte de um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> convite.

trans-unit.source: However, it is displayed on the user interface when a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> receives an invitation for the application.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, ele é exibido ao usuário interface quando um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> recebe um convite para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera recursos usados pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera recursos usados pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Definido como <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> e libera opcionalmente os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> a ser testada quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> com a instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance provided has matching data, else <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="true" /> se a instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> fornecida tiver dados correspondentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="other" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse método também retornará <see langword="false" /> se <paramref name="other" /> for <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: No normalizations are performed on the strings prior to comparison.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum normalizations são executadas em cadeias de caracteres antes da comparação.

trans-unit.source: All normalization should have been completed while or before constructing the PeerApplication objects.
trans-unit.target: Normalização de todos os deve foram concluída durante ou antes de criar os objetos de PeerApplication.

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a testar quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> ao <see cref="T:System.Object" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> is equal to the specified object instance, else <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> for igual à instância do objeto especificado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> objects are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> especificados são considerados iguais.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the specified objects have the same globally unique application <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id" /> and <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description" />, else <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="true" /> se os objetos especificados tiverem o mesmo aplicativo exclusivo <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id" /> e <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description" /> ou <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash de uma instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash de inteiro com sinal de 32 bits usado para comparar instâncias deste tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> a ser preenchido com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino dessa serialização.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data needed to serialize the target <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.
trans-unit.target: Popula um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> com os dados necessários para serializar o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> definido pelo usuário associado ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associado a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instância.

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A menos que especificado, o valor padrão dessa propriedade é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: `Null` items are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `Null` itens não são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs" /> object that contains data to be passed to delegates for the <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs" /> que contém dados a serem passados para delegados para o evento <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from this class can override this delegate to perform additional tasks when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Classes que herdam desta classe podem substituir este delegado para realizar tarefas adicionais quando o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path that designates where the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> executable file resides on the local file system.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho que determina onde o arquivo executável <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> reside no sistema de arquivos local.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the file path.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o caminho do arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A menos que explicitamente especificado, o valor padrão dessa propriedade é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: `Null` or <xref:System.String.Empty> values are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `Null` ou <xref:System.String.Empty> valores não são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scope in which the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> is registered for collaboration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o escopo no qual o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> está registrado para colaboração.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" /> object that specifies the scope in which the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> will collaborate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" /> objeto que especifica o escopo no qual o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> será colaborar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando este valor da propriedade é definido, todos os eventos não acionados como o resultado de uma operação assíncrona terão os manipuladores de evento associados chamados de volta no thread que criou o <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject" /> específico.

trans-unit.source: Object that implements the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" /> interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" /> interface e é usado por instâncias desse tipo de sincronização do manipulador de eventos no thread que criou.

trans-unit.source: The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: O valor do conjunto de padrão para essa propriedade é `null`, indicando que todos os manipuladores de eventos são chamados em um pool de threads de sistema.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set to a UI element such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> instance.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade normalmente é definida para um elemento de interface do usuário, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> instância.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de chamada foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> a ser populado com os dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino dessa serialização.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable" /> interface and returns the data required to serialize the target <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.
trans-unit.target: Implementa a interface <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable" /> e retorna os dados necessários para serializar o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id" /> and <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id" /> e <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description" /> da instância de <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id" /> and <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance, separated by a space.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id" /> e <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description" /> da instância de <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />, separada por um espaço.

trans-unit.source: This method inherits the default signature and behavior from <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método herda a assinatura padrão e o comportamento de <xref:System.Object>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.
